text: (Napiyē!) Umakku muṉṉar nām aṉuppi vaitta ovvoru tūtarum, napiyum, (ōtavō, naṉmaiyaiyō) nāṭumpōtu, avarkaḷuṭaiya anta nāṭṭattil ṣaittāṉ kuḻappattai eṟiyātiruntatillai eṉiṉum ṣaittāṉ eṟinta kuḻappattai allāh nīkkiyap piṉṉar avaṉ taṉṉuṭaiya vacaṉaṅkaḷai uṟutippaṭuttukiṟāṉ mēlum, allāh yāvaṟṟaiyum aṟintavaṉākavum, ñāṉam mikkōṉākavum irukkiṉṟāṉ
